channel.title: Lean on Sanjay's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lean on Sanjay's Blog

item.title: learn go with tests
item.description: Part 1: Introduction This is an article about my experience completing “Go with Tests.” I wanted to learn a back-end programming language for web development, so after completing CS50, I first got started with web development from The Odin Project. However, I only did a few lessons and wasn’t very consistent. Additionally, I felt like every three out of five engineering college students were learning the MERN tech stack, so I wanted to do something different.
